**Highest Supreme Celestial Master Scripture-Receiving Ritual**

**Title:** *Highest Supreme Celestial Master Scripture-Receiving Ritual*
**Author:** Unknown
**Volume:** One scroll
**Source:** *Canon of the Orthodox Daoist Treasure (正統道藏)*, First Section

---

**Highest Supreme Celestial Master Scripture-Receiving Ritual**

The Most August Saint unfurls the sacred diagram,
Illuminating brilliance spreads in splendor.
The essence of True Primordial is refined,
Wondrous patterns emit their fragrant virtue.

In the early days of the Great Cataclysm, at the dawn of Vermilion Clarity,
The Most High Lord of Primordial Origin rode the Vermilion Chaos,
Accumulating the sacred *qi* of the Great Primordial,
Manifesting in the Eastern Heaven of Beginning Azure,
Among the Ten Directions’ Celestial Immortals, the Most August Saints,
The Wondrous Conduct True Persons—
An innumerable assembly—
Proclaimed the *Lingbao Degren* (Soul-Treasure Scripture for Deliverance) and the Celestial Master Scriptures,
And bestowed them upon the Jade Canopy Most High Dao Lord.

Thereupon, He commanded the Celestial Immortal Sovereign and the Upper Clarity Immortals
To compile the essential meanings,
Arrange the graded teachings,
And together compose sixty volumes,
Corresponding to the Six Heavenly Stems,
All beginning with *Wuliang Degren* (Infinite Deliverance).

When the scriptures were complete,
They were presented to the Void Sovereign,
And stored in the Purple Micro Palace above.
They were entrusted to the Celestial Master, the True King of Jade Clarity,
Sealed within the Jade Chamber of the Eastern Extremity’s Splendid Hall,
To be transmitted only in a later kalpa.

In the era of the Flourishing Song Dynasty,
When the *qi* of Great Peace prevailed,
At the auspicious juncture of Celestial Master’s descent,
He was destined to become the sovereign of mortals.
Thus, the Green Flower Emperor, His younger brother,
Was appointed to oversee the Celestial Treasury,
While the True King received the Celestial Mandate,
Inheriting the august lineage,
Ruling the Nine Realms,
Harmonizing the Ten Thousand States,
Manifesting the Dao’s transformation,
And proclaiming the sacred wind of the Primordial.

After the reign of *Rénchén* (1144 CE),
The Green Flower Emperor secretly convened in the Forbidden Palace,
Divine correspondence was perfected,
Heaven and humanity communed—
Thus, the appointed time was revealed.

Then, the True King ascended in spirit,
Piercing the Purple Clarity,
And from the Celestial Master’s Jade Chamber,
He retrieved the *Lingbao Zhenjing* (Soul-Treasure True Scripture) in sixty volumes.
Additionally, in ancient times,
He had served the Primordial Origin,
Ascending together to the *Yùluó* (Jade Net),
Witnessing the sacred *qi* of the Three Primordials’ luminous net,
And thus composed the *Highest Supreme Celestial Master Jade Clarity Secret Talismans* in three volumes,
Which had been meticulously examined in the era of the Most High Emperor,
Verified in the Purple Micro Constellation,
And likewise kept secret within the Celestial Master’s kalpa-long prohibition.
Now, they are to be revealed.

He then instructed His celestial ministers and officials
To adapt the scriptures and talismans to human teachings,
Clothe them in worldly forms,
Establish ritual frameworks,
And propagate them among those of noble resolve.

If one encounters this Dao and diligently practices it,
They are surely those whose names were inscribed in antiquity,
Whose forms are painted in the Three Imperial Floral Patterns,
Whose bones are refined by the Five Radiant Energies,
Whose inner essence is preserved by the *Kèbǎo* (Preservation Method),
And who are destined for the *Rénchén* (1144 CE) deliverance—
True practitioners of the Dao.
In the myriad kalpas,
To meet this moment is rare indeed—
How could one not strive with utmost earnestness?

**The Three Masters of the Highest Supreme Celestial Dao:**

- **Ancestor Master:** *Yuhuang Shangdi Yuan Shi Tianzun* (Jade Sovereign, Most High Lord of Primordial Origin)
- **Lineage Master:** *Shang Qing Yuzhen Yuan Huang Daojun* (Upper Clarity, Jade Canopy Primordial Dao Lord)
- **True Master:** *Gāoshàng Shénxiāo Yùqīng Zhēnwáng Chángshēng Dàjūn* (Highest Supreme Celestial Master, Jade Clarity True King of Eternal Lordship)

---

The above scriptures all bear the title *Taishang Dongxuan Lingbao Wuliang Duren Shangpin Miaojing* (The Supreme Venerable Perfected One’s Mystic Treasure of Boundless Salvation, Supreme Grade Wondrous Scripture).

The *Gaoshang Shenshang Lingbao Duren Jing* (The Highest Celestial Highest Dao’s Mystic Treasure Scripture of Salvation) in sixty-one volumes likewise originates from the Jade Chamber of the Eastern Extremity’s Azure Hall within the Celestial Highness. It is an eternal, forbidden, and perpetually transmitted scripture across kalpas. Those who encounter this Dao preserve themselves by ascending to the Three Realms, benefit others by eradicating a hundred afflictions in the kalpa, and through their merit and virtue, attain the Celestial Highness. Later, they shall be appointed as officials governing and transforming the realm.

If mortals recite and practice it according to the method, they shall attain boundless blessings and verified efficacy, as recorded in the original scripture.

**Highest Celestial Yùqīng Secret Rituals**
The *Shenshang Yùqīng Mìlù* (Celestial Highness Yùqīng Secret Rituals) aligns with the *Tàiwéi* (Great Enclosure) classifications and equals the subtlety of *Dòngzhēn* (Penetrating Reality). It is also the pinnacle of the Upper Clarity. It may be used to supplement the Great Cavern’s grades and worn as prescribed; its effects vary according to one’s cultivation, as stated in the original ritual.

**Explanatory Commentaries**
The *Mixed Primordial Supreme Virtue Emperor’s* (Húnyuán Shàngdé Huángdì) *Daode* (Way and Virtue) Two Scriptures—these are the imperial compositions of the Song Emperor Huizong, the Dao Sovereign.
*The Nanhua Zhenjing Xiaoyao You Zhēnyì Zhǐguī* (The True Meaning and Guidance of the *Zhuangzi*’s *Xiaoyao You*—The Wandering Free) is also an imperial composition of the Song Emperor Huizong, the Dao Sovereign.

**Supplementary Commentaries**
Li Yùdé’s elucidation of the *Lingbao Duren Jing*’s meaning, with a preface by the True King Lord—these are the true commentaries and explanations.

The *Gaoshang Shenshang Zhēnyù Shuō* (Highest Celestial True Jade Explanation) of the *Five-Directional Heaven’s Good-Generation-No-Killing Praise*—this originates from the *Miaojì Jingkē* (Wondrous Salvation Ritual Science) of the Celestial Highness’ Eastern Extremity Azure Hall. Reciting it resolves the calamity of unjustly harming life and cultivates the merit of good-generation and non-killing.

The *Zhènghé Yùzhì Jīnlu Zhōngkē Yí* (Political Harmony’s Imperial Composition of the Golden Register’s Central Ritual)—this ritual is for national fasting, ritual offerings, and supplications for blessings and disaster aversion. Included are:
*The Dàdòng Zhāozhēn Tōngwēi Miòuzhāng* (Great Cavern’s Summoning the Perfected’s Communion with the Subtle, Wondrous Chapter),
*The Bùxū Yùqīng Yuè* (Ascending the Void’s Celestial Clarity Music),
*The Shàngqīng Yuè* (Upper Clarity Music),
*The Tàiqīng Yuè* (Supreme Clarity Music),
*The Sǎnhuā Yuè* (Scattering Flowers Music),
*The Báihè Yǐn* (White Crane Induction),
*The Shòu Tiānmíng Mìng Gē* (Receiving the Celestial Bright Command Song),
*The Jīnquè Shǐqīng Bùxū Gēzhāng* (Golden Gate’s Emerald Green Ascending the Void Song Chapter),
*The Gāozhēn Dàodé Bùxū Gēzhāng* (Highest Perfected Way and Virtue Ascending the Void Song Chapter),
*The Yóudào Tàiwéi Bùxū Gēzhāng* (Unique Dao’s Great Enclosure Ascending the Void Song Chapter),
*The Xiàjì Dìqí Jiàngé Chūxiàn Jì* (Summer Sacrifice to the Earth Deity’s Descending and Manifestation Record),
*The Gāoshang Shenshang Zhēnwáng Chángshēng Dàdì Jiàngshēng Jì* (Highest Celestial True King Eternal Emperor’s Manifestation Record),
*The Shàngqīng Yùshū Zhēnfú Zhàoyàn Zhūjì* (Upper Clarity Jade Book True Symbol’s Verification Records),
*The Dōngsì Tiānzhēn Xiànlín Shìxiàn Pǐnjì* (Winter Sacrifice to the Celestial True One’s Descending and Manifestation Record).

These sacred records of the Celestial Highness’ sacred and secret rituals narrate the Celestial Highness’ Sacred Emperor’s and the Azure Hua Emperor’s divine descent and manifestations in the forbidden and secluded halls across kalpas, revealing their numinous transformations.

The Celestial Highness’ Jade Treasury’s Eastern and Western Halls oversee the secret transmissions of the various immortal officials. These transmissions record the cultivation and attainment of the Dao by the immortal officials, as well as their governance of the Celestial Highness’ duties.

Among the Celestial Highness’ Inner Treasury’s Three Caverns and Four Auxiliaries—some have been transmitted since antiquity and are widely seen in the world, while others are forbidden and secret treasures of a thousand two hundred volumes, undivulged across kalpas. These are categorized into six grades and twelve classes, arranged into upper, middle, and lower volumes, stored in the Eastern and Western Azure Halls. From the era of *Taiping Qǐyùn* (Great Peace’s Auspicious Commencement) in the years *Rénchén Gēngzǐ* (Renchen, 1174 CE) onward, they shall gradually manifest.

Those who fully master one of the upper scriptures shall be titled *Shenshang Wángtiān Dòngjǐng Fǎshī Xūyuán Tǒnghuà Zhēnqīng* (Celestial Highness King-Heaven Cavern Mirror Master, Void Origin, Unified Transformation True Lord). Upon attaining the Dao, they shall hold the rank of *Yùfǔ Shàngxiàng Shàngzǎi Zhēnbó* (Jade Treasury’s Upper Grand Minister and Upper Chancellor True Lord).

Those who fully master one of the middle scriptures shall be titled *Shenshang Dònghuà Fǎshī Bǎodù Hé míng Zhēnqīng* (Celestial Highness Cavern Transformation Master, Preserving Virtue and Clarity True Lord). Upon attaining the Dao, they shall hold the rank of *Dōngxī Èrtái Xiānqīng Xiānhóu* (Eastern and Western Halls’ Immortal Officials and Immortal Marshals).

Those who fully master one of the lower scriptures shall be titled *Shenshang Yuánhuà Fǎshī Língmiào Tōngyuán Zhēnqīng* (Celestial Highness Primordial Transformation Master, Numinous and Marvelous, Penetrating Origin True Lord). Upon attaining the Dao, they shall hold the rank of *Dōngxī Èrtái Xiānguān Chánglì Jiǔgōng Zhēnzǎi* (Eastern and Western Halls’ Immortal Officials, Long Officers, and Nine Palaces’ True Rulers).

Their ritual attire consists of:
- The *Yùqīng Yúntái Bǎoguān* (Jade Clarity Cloud Platform Precious Crown),
- The *Zǐlíng Cuìyù zhī zān* (Purple Spirit Jade Terrapin Hairpin),
- The *Fēiyún Yùyā Lǜguāng zhī pèi* (Flying Clouds and Misty Glow Green Light Robe, thirty-six layers),
- The *Hèhuáng shang fēiqīng zhī kūn* (Brown-Yellow Robe with Flying Blue Skirt),
- The *Zhūyáng zhī lǚ* (Cinnabar-Sole Sandals),
- The *Dònglíng Bìyáo zhī guī* (Cavern Spirit Jade Jade Tablet),
- The *Sānqì Jiāohuī Yùpèi* (Three Breaths’ Radiant Jade Pendant),
- The *Zhèn yào xiāomó zhī jiàn* (Shaking Demons’ Dissolving Sword, three feet six inches long),
- And standing upon the *Tà jiǔqì zhī tán* (Platform of the Nine Breaths).

If, among the three stages, one obtains the complete volumes of the upper, middle, or lower scriptures—or even possesses one or two of the Three Caverns’ teachings in the mortal world—they shall be titled *Shenshang Tàipíng Fǔhuà Dìzǐ* (Celestial Highness Great Peace’s Auxiliary Transformation Disciple). Upon attaining the Dao, they shall hold the rank of *Zhūtiān Xiānzhēn* (Various Heavens’ Immortal Perfected) or may also be appointed as *Shénfǔ Sǎn guān Xiānlì* (Jade Treasury’s Scattered Officials and Immortal Ministers). However, they shall not yet hold the noble status of the Highest Pure Jade Heaven, nor necessarily wield the authority of the supreme ritual officials.

Their ritual attire consists of:
- The *Sùyù Sānhuá Bìguān* (Pure Jade Triple Flower Precious Crown) or *Sān Sùyuán guān* (Three Pure Primordial Crown),
- The *Zǐjīng Shuǐyù zhī zān* (Purple Essence Water Jade Hairpin),
- The *Sùzǐ zhī bèi* (Pure Purple Robe, thirty-six layers),
- The *Bìhèhuáng shang lǜqīng zhī kūn* (Dark Brown-Yellow Robe with Green-Blue Skirt),
- The *Huánghuá Yáojiǎn Zhūlǚ* (Yellow Flower Jade Tablet Cinnabar Sandals),
- The *Yùpèi* (Jade Pendant),
- The *Wǔqì Dānjīng zhī jiàn* (Five Breaths’ Elixir Sword, three feet two inches long),
- And standing upon the *Tà sānguāng Bāwéi zhī tán* (Platform of the Three Lights and Eight Halos).

If one receives the teachings and fulfills all three stages, upon attaining the Dao, they shall ascend to the position of *Sāntiān Gāohuáng Dàojūn* (Three Heavens’ High Sovereign Dao Lord), ranking equally with the saints.

Unless one submits a memorial and petition to the Perfected Court for ritual inspection, one may not arbitrarily wear the ritual attire. The Spirit Officials shall investigate and punish those who fall from the Dao.

The reception ceremony for the Highest Celestial Highness’s lineage master in receiving the scriptures is complete.

chunks.original_text: 高上神霄宗师受经式 经名：高上神霄宗师受经式。 撰者不详。 一卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》正一部。 高上神霄宗师受经式 上圣开图，明华散蔼。 真元经粹，妙范流芳。 粤在浩劫赤明之初，元始之尊乘赤混太元灵积生之炁，应化於东方始青诸天，与十方天真大神、上圣高尊、妙行真人，无鞅数众，演说《灵宝度人》神霄众经，并以授於玉宸太上道君。 因命天真皇人并上清诸真人，总其元义，开品分条，共为六十卷，以应六甲之数，皆以无量度人为首。 其经既成，简奏虚皇，遂使藏于紫微上宫，仍今付於神霄玉清真王君，秘於东极华堂琼室之内，至於后劫，方当下传。 逮其炎宋，兴隆太平，炁至时际，吉会神霄，真王当降世间，以为人主。 遂举其弟青华帝君，代领神府之任，真王受天明命，绍承丕祚，统御九有，协和万邦，显彰道化，阐神元风。 政和壬辰之后，青华时来密会禁掖，神明齐契，天人相通，所以告於期运者焉。 於是，真王飞神达变，洞合紫清，乃以神霄琼室所秘《灵宝真经》六十卷。 又以昔侍元始，同登郁罗，观览三元灵光玉网之炁，而成《高上神霄玉清秘箓》三卷，尝於上皇年间详考於玉晨之手，定格於紫微之房，亦在神霄历劫禁重，今并当出。 乃遗左右仙卿仙吏，将其经箓，着以人间之义，易以世俗之迹，置设科式，宣扬於志节之士。 若其得遇此道，勤而修之，皆是夙简元名，形绘帝轩三华，炼骨五辉，内缠克保，为壬辰受度之人，学真之士，万劫之中，际遇此时，是为难也，可不勉之者哉。 玉清虚皇元始天尊为祖师。 上清玉宸元皇道君为宗师。 高上神霄玉清真王长生大君为真师。 已上高上神霄大道三师。 《高上神霄太上洞玄灵宝度人经》六十卷：《太上洞玄灵宝度人上品妙经》、《清微金科上品妙经》、《禹余玉律上品妙经》、《大赤灵文上品妙经》、《玉宸大道上品妙经》、《太一元精上品经》、《日精阳明上品妙经》、《月华阴景上品妙经》、《离合五行化体上品妙经》、《断绝胎根闭塞死户上品妙经》、《腾曜二景五星上品妙经》、《扶桑青阳上品妙经》、《素景曜灵上品妙经》、《五方正炁上品妙经》、《五行顺治上品妙经》、《天地八维安镇国祚上品妙经》、《求延劫运保世升平上品妙经》、《飞神召灵上品妙经》、《降真召灵上品妙经》、《十方圣境上品妙经》。 明体贯炁品：《九霄高玄上品妙经》、《九宫仙籍上品妙经》、《八景神合上品妙经》、《玉明运度上品妙经》。 赤符丹光品：《紫光丹灵上品妙经》、 《碧落空歌上品妙经》、《炼黑变仙上品妙经》、《神变炁化上品妙经》、《生化胎根断除邪秽上品妙经》、《回骸起死上品妙经》、《长生久视上品妙经》、《三晨光曜保命延生上品妙经》、《降真延寿上品妙经》、《保胎护命上品妙经》、《消禳国君王侯世土上品妙经》、《太一神变五福护国禳兵上品妙经》、《七星除妖上品妙经》、《神符除难上品妙经》、《洞神禳灾上品妙经》、《祈禳水旱上品妙经》、《消除灾疫保命延年上品妙经》、《除禳水火漂溺上品妙经》、《解禳山谷瘴疠上品妙经》、《消除病疠跛病上品妙经》、《显瑞符应上品妙经》、《阴阳化生上品妙经》、《五行备足生灵寿域上品妙经》、《安镇九垒土妖不祥上品妙经》、《祈求嗣续庆延门阀上品妙经》、《蠲化水火灾疠上品妙经》、《玄明洞渊上品妙经》、《南宫延生上品妙经》、《北都除殃上品妙经》、《斩馘不祥上品妙经》、《斩灭五行邪怪上品妙经》、《追度上世亡魂上品妙经》、《解释幽牢上品妙经》、《济度死魂上品妙经》、《化尸受形上品妙经》、《永断轮转上口叩妙经》。

**Highest Supreme Celestial Master Scripture-Receiving Ritual**

**Title:** *Highest Supreme Celestial Master Scripture-Receiving Ritual*

**Volume:** One scroll
**Source:** *Canon of the Orthodox Daoist Treasure (正統道藏)*, First Section

**Highest Supreme Celestial Master Scripture-Receiving Ritual**

The Most August Saint unfurls the sacred diagram,
Illuminating brilliance spreads in splendor.
The essence of True Primordial is refined,
Wondrous patterns emit their fragrant virtue.

In the early days of the Great Cataclysm, at the dawn of Vermilion Clarity,
The Most High Lord of Primordial Origin rode the Vermilion Chaos,
Accumulating the sacred *qi* of the Great Primordial,
Manifesting in the Eastern Heaven of Beginning Azure,
Among the Ten Directions’ Celestial Immortals, the Most August Saints,
The Wondrous Conduct True Persons—
An innumerable assembly—
Proclaimed the *Lingbao Degren* (Soul-Treasure Scripture for Deliverance) and the Celestial Master Scriptures,
And bestowed them upon the Jade Canopy Most High Dao Lord.

Thereupon, He commanded the Celestial Immortal Sovereign and the Upper Clarity Immortals
To compile the essential meanings,
Arrange the graded teachings,
And together compose sixty volumes,
Corresponding to the Six Heavenly Stems,
All beginning with *Wuliang Degren* (Infinite Deliverance).

When the scriptures were complete,
They were presented to the Void Sovereign,
And stored in the Purple Micro Palace above.
They were entrusted to the Celestial Master, the True King of Jade Clarity,
Sealed within the Jade Chamber of the Eastern Extremity’s Splendid Hall,
To be transmitted only in a later kalpa.

In the era of the Flourishing Song Dynasty,
When the *qi* of Great Peace prevailed,
At the auspicious juncture of Celestial Master’s descent,
He was destined to become the sovereign of mortals.
Thus, the Green Flower Emperor, His younger brother,
Was appointed to oversee the Celestial Treasury,
While the True King received the Celestial Mandate,
Inheriting the august lineage,
Ruling the Nine Realms,
Harmonizing the Ten Thousand States,
Manifesting the Dao’s transformation,
And proclaiming the sacred wind of the Primordial.

After the reign of *Rénchén* (1144 CE),
The Green Flower Emperor secretly convened in the Forbidden Palace,
Divine correspondence was perfected,
Heaven and humanity communed—
Thus, the appointed time was revealed.

Then, the True King ascended in spirit,
Piercing the Purple Clarity,
And from the Celestial Master’s Jade Chamber,
He retrieved the *Lingbao Zhenjing* (Soul-Treasure True Scripture) in sixty volumes.
Additionally, in ancient times,
He had served the Primordial Origin,
Ascending together to the *Yùluó* (Jade Net),
Witnessing the sacred *qi* of the Three Primordials’ luminous net,
And thus composed the *Highest Supreme Celestial Master Jade Clarity Secret Talismans* in three volumes,
Which had been meticulously examined in the era of the Most High Emperor,
Verified in the Purple Micro Constellation,
And likewise kept secret within the Celestial Master’s kalpa-long prohibition.
Now, they are to be revealed.

He then instructed His celestial ministers and officials
To adapt the scriptures and talismans to human teachings,
Clothe them in worldly forms,
Establish ritual frameworks,
And propagate them among those of noble resolve.

If one encounters this Dao and diligently practices it,
They are surely those whose names were inscribed in antiquity,
Whose forms are painted in the Three Imperial Floral Patterns,
Whose bones are refined by the Five Radiant Energies,
Whose inner essence is preserved by the *Kèbǎo* (Preservation Method),
And who are destined for the *Rénchén* (1144 CE) deliverance—
True practitioners of the Dao.
In the myriad kalpas,
To meet this moment is rare indeed—
How could one not strive with utmost earnestness?

**The Three Masters of the Highest Supreme Celestial Dao:**

- **Ancestor Master:** *Yuhuang Shangdi Yuan Shi Tianzun* (Jade Sovereign, Most High Lord of Primordial Origin)
- **Lineage Master:** *Shang Qing Yuzhen Yuan Huang Daojun* (Upper Clarity, Jade Canopy Primordial Dao Lord)
- **True Master:** *Gāoshàng Shénxiāo Yùqīng Zhēnwáng Chángshēng Dàjūn* (Highest Supreme Celestial Master, Jade Clarity True King of Eternal Lordship)

chunks.original_text: 已上经题，各有《太上洞玄灵宝无量度人上品妙经》字。 《高上神霄灵宝度人经》六十一卷，并出於神霄东极华堂琼室之中。 乃历劫禁秘永传经也。 得遇此道，保己则登升三境，为人则劫灭百痾，功德协着，克度神霄，后当获补，宰制治化之官矣。 世人受诵，修奉如法，即得福庆无量功验之应，各如本经所载者。 高上神霄玉清秘箓 《神霄玉清秘箓》按太微科格，与洞真齐妙，亦上清之标冠矣。 可辅於大洞之品，而受佩如法，随其学功，各如本箓所言。 解注 混元上德皇帝《道德》二经之义，乃宋徽宗道君皇帝御制是也。 《南华真经逍遥游真义指归》，乃宋徽宗道君皇帝御制是也。 补注 李玉德解《灵宝度人经》义，真王君制序，右解注真义。 高上神霄真玉说《五 方天中好生不杀颂》，右出神霄东极华堂妙济经科之中，诵之解脱物命天枉之祸，修好生不杀之功焉。 政和御制《金箓中科仪》，右科仪为国修斋设醮、祈禳福佑，《大洞招真通微妙章》、《步虚玉清乐》、《上清乐》、《太清乐》、《散花乐》、《白鹤引右招真通微妙章》、《受天明命歌》、《金阙始青步虚歌章》、《高真道德步虚歌章》、《尤道太微步虚歌章》、《夏祭地祇降格出现记》、《高上神霄真王长生大帝降生记》、《上清玉书真符照验诸记》、《冬祀天真降临示现品记》。 右诸真记神霄纪圣秘箓，乃述长生大君同青华帝君，前后飞神临降禁掖，昭示灵化之事。 神霄玉府东西二台掌治诸仙卿秘传，右诸传，乃纪述诸仙卿修真得道、掌领神霄职任之事。 右神霄内府所存三洞四辅，有自古以传者，或多见於世间，有历劫未传禁秘宝经一千二百卷，分为六等一十二品，列为上中下三卷，藏于东西华堂。 自太平启运壬辰庚子之后，渐当降显。 有得备上一经法者，称神霄王天洞景法师虚元统化真卿，道成得为玉府上相上宰真伯之任。 有得备中一经法者，当称神霄洞化法师保度合明真卿，道成得为东西二台仙卿仙侯之任。 有得备下一经法者，当称神霄元化法师灵妙通元真卿，道成得为东西二台仙官长吏九宫真宰之任。 其法服：玉清云台宝冠，紫灵翠玉之簪，飞云郁霭绿光之帔三十六条，褐黄裳飞青之裙，朱阳之履，洞灵碧瑶之珪，三炁交晖玉佩，震耀消魔之剑长三尺六寸，蹑九炁之坛。 若三阶之中，或得上经、中经、下经卷帙朱备，或兼三洞在世一二经法，当称为神霄太平辅化弟子，道成得为诸天仙真之任，或亦补为神府散官仙吏之职，但未得专处高清玉天之贵，不能必掌神符上司之权焉。 其法服：素玉三华碧冠，或三素元冠，紫精水玉之簪，素紫之被三十六条，碧褐黄裳绿青之裙，黄华瑶简朱履，玉佩，五炁丹精之剑，长三尺二寸，蹑三光八纬之坛。 一若有受其经法，三阶俱备，道成则登三天高皇道君之位，与诸圣齐伦者矣。 非拜表上章朝真阅箓行事，其法服不可辄服，灵官检察堕道之功。 高上神霄宗师受经式竟

The above scriptures all bear the title *Taishang Dongxuan Lingbao Wuliang Duren Shangpin Miaojing* (The Supreme Venerable Perfected One’s Mystic Treasure of Boundless Salvation, Supreme Grade Wondrous Scripture).

The *Gaoshang Shenshang Lingbao Duren Jing* (The Highest Celestial Highest Dao’s Mystic Treasure Scripture of Salvation) in sixty-one volumes likewise originates from the Jade Chamber of the Eastern Extremity’s Azure Hall within the Celestial Highness. It is an eternal, forbidden, and perpetually transmitted scripture across kalpas. Those who encounter this Dao preserve themselves by ascending to the Three Realms, benefit others by eradicating a hundred afflictions in the kalpa, and through their merit and virtue, attain the Celestial Highness. Later, they shall be appointed as officials governing and transforming the realm.

If mortals recite and practice it according to the method, they shall attain boundless blessings and verified efficacy, as recorded in the original scripture.

**Highest Celestial Yùqīng Secret Rituals**
The *Shenshang Yùqīng Mìlù* (Celestial Highness Yùqīng Secret Rituals) aligns with the *Tàiwéi* (Great Enclosure) classifications and equals the subtlety of *Dòngzhēn* (Penetrating Reality). It is also the pinnacle of the Upper Clarity. It may be used to supplement the Great Cavern’s grades and worn as prescribed; its effects vary according to one’s cultivation, as stated in the original ritual.

**Explanatory Commentaries**
The *Mixed Primordial Supreme Virtue Emperor’s* (Húnyuán Shàngdé Huángdì) *Daode* (Way and Virtue) Two Scriptures—these are the imperial compositions of the Song Emperor Huizong, the Dao Sovereign.
*The Nanhua Zhenjing Xiaoyao You Zhēnyì Zhǐguī* (The True Meaning and Guidance of the *Zhuangzi*’s *Xiaoyao You*—The Wandering Free) is also an imperial composition of the Song Emperor Huizong, the Dao Sovereign.

**Supplementary Commentaries**
Li Yùdé’s elucidation of the *Lingbao Duren Jing*’s meaning, with a preface by the True King Lord—these are the true commentaries and explanations.

The *Gaoshang Shenshang Zhēnyù Shuō* (Highest Celestial True Jade Explanation) of the *Five-Directional Heaven’s Good-Generation-No-Killing Praise*—this originates from the *Miaojì Jingkē* (Wondrous Salvation Ritual Science) of the Celestial Highness’ Eastern Extremity Azure Hall. Reciting it resolves the calamity of unjustly harming life and cultivates the merit of good-generation and non-killing.

The *Zhènghé Yùzhì Jīnlu Zhōngkē Yí* (Political Harmony’s Imperial Composition of the Golden Register’s Central Ritual)—this ritual is for national fasting, ritual offerings, and supplications for blessings and disaster aversion. Included are:
*The Dàdòng Zhāozhēn Tōngwēi Miòuzhāng* (Great Cavern’s Summoning the Perfected’s Communion with the Subtle, Wondrous Chapter),
*The Bùxū Yùqīng Yuè* (Ascending the Void’s Celestial Clarity Music),
*The Shàngqīng Yuè* (Upper Clarity Music),
*The Tàiqīng Yuè* (Supreme Clarity Music),
*The Sǎnhuā Yuè* (Scattering Flowers Music),
*The Báihè Yǐn* (White Crane Induction),
*The Shòu Tiānmíng Mìng Gē* (Receiving the Celestial Bright Command Song),
*The Jīnquè Shǐqīng Bùxū Gēzhāng* (Golden Gate’s Emerald Green Ascending the Void Song Chapter),
*The Gāozhēn Dàodé Bùxū Gēzhāng* (Highest Perfected Way and Virtue Ascending the Void Song Chapter),
*The Yóudào Tàiwéi Bùxū Gēzhāng* (Unique Dao’s Great Enclosure Ascending the Void Song Chapter),
*The Xiàjì Dìqí Jiàngé Chūxiàn Jì* (Summer Sacrifice to the Earth Deity’s Descending and Manifestation Record),
*The Gāoshang Shenshang Zhēnwáng Chángshēng Dàdì Jiàngshēng Jì* (Highest Celestial True King Eternal Emperor’s Manifestation Record),
*The Shàngqīng Yùshū Zhēnfú Zhàoyàn Zhūjì* (Upper Clarity Jade Book True Symbol’s Verification Records),
*The Dōngsì Tiānzhēn Xiànlín Shìxiàn Pǐnjì* (Winter Sacrifice to the Celestial True One’s Descending and Manifestation Record).

These sacred records of the Celestial Highness’ sacred and secret rituals narrate the Celestial Highness’ Sacred Emperor’s and the Azure Hua Emperor’s divine descent and manifestations in the forbidden and secluded halls across kalpas, revealing their numinous transformations.

The Celestial Highness’ Jade Treasury’s Eastern and Western Halls oversee the secret transmissions of the various immortal officials. These transmissions record the cultivation and attainment of the Dao by the immortal officials, as well as their governance of the Celestial Highness’ duties.

Among the Celestial Highness’ Inner Treasury’s Three Caverns and Four Auxiliaries—some have been transmitted since antiquity and are widely seen in the world, while others are forbidden and secret treasures of a thousand two hundred volumes, undivulged across kalpas. These are categorized into six grades and twelve classes, arranged into upper, middle, and lower volumes, stored in the Eastern and Western Azure Halls. From the era of *Taiping Qǐyùn* (Great Peace’s Auspicious Commencement) in the years *Rénchén Gēngzǐ* (Renchen, 1174 CE) onward, they shall gradually manifest.

Those who fully master one of the upper scriptures shall be titled *Shenshang Wángtiān Dòngjǐng Fǎshī Xūyuán Tǒnghuà Zhēnqīng* (Celestial Highness King-Heaven Cavern Mirror Master, Void Origin, Unified Transformation True Lord). Upon attaining the Dao, they shall hold the rank of *Yùfǔ Shàngxiàng Shàngzǎi Zhēnbó* (Jade Treasury’s Upper Grand Minister and Upper Chancellor True Lord).

Those who fully master one of the middle scriptures shall be titled *Shenshang Dònghuà Fǎshī Bǎodù Hé míng Zhēnqīng* (Celestial Highness Cavern Transformation Master, Preserving Virtue and Clarity True Lord). Upon attaining the Dao, they shall hold the rank of *Dōngxī Èrtái Xiānqīng Xiānhóu* (Eastern and Western Halls’ Immortal Officials and Immortal Marshals).

Those who fully master one of the lower scriptures shall be titled *Shenshang Yuánhuà Fǎshī Língmiào Tōngyuán Zhēnqīng* (Celestial Highness Primordial Transformation Master, Numinous and Marvelous, Penetrating Origin True Lord). Upon attaining the Dao, they shall hold the rank of *Dōngxī Èrtái Xiānguān Chánglì Jiǔgōng Zhēnzǎi* (Eastern and Western Halls’ Immortal Officials, Long Officers, and Nine Palaces’ True Rulers).

Their ritual attire consists of:
- The *Yùqīng Yúntái Bǎoguān* (Jade Clarity Cloud Platform Precious Crown),
- The *Zǐlíng Cuìyù zhī zān* (Purple Spirit Jade Terrapin Hairpin),
- The *Fēiyún Yùyā Lǜguāng zhī pèi* (Flying Clouds and Misty Glow Green Light Robe, thirty-six layers),
- The *Hèhuáng shang fēiqīng zhī kūn* (Brown-Yellow Robe with Flying Blue Skirt),
- The *Zhūyáng zhī lǚ* (Cinnabar-Sole Sandals),
- The *Dònglíng Bìyáo zhī guī* (Cavern Spirit Jade Jade Tablet),
- The *Sānqì Jiāohuī Yùpèi* (Three Breaths’ Radiant Jade Pendant),
- The *Zhèn yào xiāomó zhī jiàn* (Shaking Demons’ Dissolving Sword, three feet six inches long),
- And standing upon the *Tà jiǔqì zhī tán* (Platform of the Nine Breaths).

If, among the three stages, one obtains the complete volumes of the upper, middle, or lower scriptures—or even possesses one or two of the Three Caverns’ teachings in the mortal world—they shall be titled *Shenshang Tàipíng Fǔhuà Dìzǐ* (Celestial Highness Great Peace’s Auxiliary Transformation Disciple). Upon attaining the Dao, they shall hold the rank of *Zhūtiān Xiānzhēn* (Various Heavens’ Immortal Perfected) or may also be appointed as *Shénfǔ Sǎn guān Xiānlì* (Jade Treasury’s Scattered Officials and Immortal Ministers). However, they shall not yet hold the noble status of the Highest Pure Jade Heaven, nor necessarily wield the authority of the supreme ritual officials.

Their ritual attire consists of:
- The *Sùyù Sānhuá Bìguān* (Pure Jade Triple Flower Precious Crown) or *Sān Sùyuán guān* (Three Pure Primordial Crown),
- The *Zǐjīng Shuǐyù zhī zān* (Purple Essence Water Jade Hairpin),
- The *Sùzǐ zhī bèi* (Pure Purple Robe, thirty-six layers),
- The *Bìhèhuáng shang lǜqīng zhī kūn* (Dark Brown-Yellow Robe with Green-Blue Skirt),
- The *Huánghuá Yáojiǎn Zhūlǚ* (Yellow Flower Jade Tablet Cinnabar Sandals),
- The *Yùpèi* (Jade Pendant),
- The *Wǔqì Dānjīng zhī jiàn* (Five Breaths’ Elixir Sword, three feet two inches long),
- And standing upon the *Tà sānguāng Bāwéi zhī tán* (Platform of the Three Lights and Eight Halos).

If one receives the teachings and fulfills all three stages, upon attaining the Dao, they shall ascend to the position of *Sāntiān Gāohuáng Dàojūn* (Three Heavens’ High Sovereign Dao Lord), ranking equally with the saints.

Unless one submits a memorial and petition to the Perfected Court for ritual inspection, one may not arbitrarily wear the ritual attire. The Spirit Officials shall investigate and punish those who fall from the Dao.

The reception ceremony for the Highest Celestial Highness’s lineage master in receiving the scriptures is complete.
